FrageText.de: Woran können Sie erkennen, ob an Ihrem Motorrad das Abblendlicht oder das Fernlicht eingeschaltet ist?
FrageText.en: How can you recognize whether your motorcycle's low or high beam is turned on?
FrageText.hr: Po čemu možete prepoznati je li na Vašem motociklu uključeno kratko ili dugo svjetlo?
FrageText.sl: Po čem spoznate, da imaste na motornem kolesu vklopljeno zasenčeno ali dolgo luč?
FrageText.tr: Kısa veya uzun farın açık olduğunu nasıl farkedersiniz?

de.Text: An der Ausleuchtung der Fahrbahn am Tag
An der Ausleuchtung der Fahrbahn bei Nacht

en.Text: By the illumination of the road during the day
By the illumination of the road during the night
By the high beam indicator light
By the brightness of the tail light

hr.Text: Po dobrom osvjetljenju kolnika po danu

sl.Text: Po svetlosti luči na zadnji strani
